text: Ntiyari kuba Muhammadi (aui) atari uko ari intumwa y’Imana gusa, hakaba haraciye imbere yiwe izindi ntumwa z’Imana, none asandavye canke yishwe, niho muzoca musubiza ibirenge vyanyu inyuma n’uguca muba abahakanyi b’Imana nkuko mwamye aho hambere? Rero uwuzo subiza ibitsintsiri vyiwe inyuma ntaco azogira Imana kukintu icarico cose, nayo izoba hemba abayikengurukira
